item.title: Backup org files in github
item.description: */15 * * * * cd ~/org && ./backup_files_to_github.sh >> ~/cron_log.log 2>&1 Code Snippet 1: crontab entry NOWT=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %T") git add . git commit -m "$NOWTAutomated git push" git push Code Snippet 2: backup_files_to_github.sh Checkout log rotation to avoid growth of cron_log.log The cron-job invokes the backup_files_to_github.sh once every 15 minutes to backup the org files stored in the ~/org director A better guide for the uninitiated Backup to git If you are not familiar with git, please do learn-the-basics-of-git-in-under-10-minutes before you go ahead
